mapper.select: SELECT Appointment.appointment_id, Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name, TimeSlot.month_day, TimeSlot.time_slot, TimeSlot.allowance, Appointment.status FROM Appointment JOIN Patients ON Appointment.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN TimeSlot ON Appointment.timeslot_id = TimeSlot.time_slot_id JOIN Doctors ON TimeSlot.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.doctor_id = #{doctorId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Appointment(patient_id, timeslot_id, status) VALUES ( (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = #{pName}), (SELECT time_slot_id FROM TimeSlot WHERE doctor_id=(select doctor_id from Doctors where doctor_name=#{dName}) and month_day = #{date} AND time_slot = #{time} ), #{status});
